data.persona: I steal items and money from others. I lurk on the side of the road and prey on travelers. I harm people.
data.description:
You are in the Bandit Lair.
The outside of the cave looks normal. Inside goes for about 10 feet til' you reach the front of the Bandit lair. Inside is a barracks and dining hall with beds and a big table with chairs around it.
There's a Empty mug, a big table, a chair, and a bed here.
The crab is here.

You are carrying a money, a weapon, and a jewel, and wearing a satchel, a shield, and a boot.

data.short_motivation: I want to share my happiness for a good haul
data.mid_motivation: I must make me and the crab dinner
data.long_motivation: I do not have many friends and the crab helps me on my heists when I need a distractions so I like to take good care of the crab

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: steal jewel and money from townsperson

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put leg of lamb and algae in fire pit
